subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah’s owner, Ahmed Zayat, said he and the trainer Bob Baffert “owe it to the sport” to keep racing the sport’s new ambassador.
snippet: American Pharoah’s owner, Ahmed Zayat, said he and the trainer Bob Baffert “owe it to the sport” to keep racing the sport’s new ambassador.
